reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Back to Back meetings: Guidelines and tools for preparation of comprehensive National strategic plans for control and Eradication of PPR & FMD regional progress Meeting.

description.narrative: Support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade.

This award strives to support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade. In addition, this award During this conference, the global strategy for the control and eradication of PPR was presented. This strategy included the organization of regional meetings under the GF-TADs (global framework for the control of transboundary animal diseases) for the development of regional roadmaps to commit countries to harmonize and synchronize the fight against the disease, ensured the assessment and continuous monitoring of PPR situation and the harmonize the application of the overall PPR control strategy and eradication worldwide..

participating-org.usg:office-name: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: In 2005, after 15 years of economic stagnation and political instability, Togo started along a gradual path to democratic reform. Since then, Togo has held several elections deemed free and fair by international observers, including a presidential election in April 2015. Togo has also sought to liberalize business regulations, trade policies, and worked to re-engage with the international community. The United States, along with the rest of the international community, aims to encourage the Government of Togo (GOT) to further political and economic reforms. FY 2017 assistance seeks to develop a professionalized military that respects civilian leadership and democratic institutions.

usg:treasury-account.usg:main-account: Salaries and Expenses, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service, Agriculture
